Augment.Name: Melancholic Flames (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Adds Adamantine material type. On hit: 16d6 Fire Damage.

Augment.Name: Melancholic Chill (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Adds Cold Iron material type. On hit: 16d6 Cold Damage.

Augment.Name: Melancholic Sparks (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Adds Silver material type. On hit: 16d6 Electric Damage.

Augment.Name: Melancholic Acid (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Adds Crystal and Byeshk material type. On hit: 16d6 Acid Damage.

Augment.Name: Melancholic Dimlight (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +9 Enhancement bonus to Spell Penetration. If this is slotted in a Quarterstaff, also grants a +2 Exceptional bonus to Spell DCs and makes the Quarterstaff an Implement.

Augment.Name: Melancholic Shadows (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +10% Enhancement bonus to Spell Cost Reduction. If this is slotted in a Quarterstaff, also grants a +2 Exceptional bonus to Spell DCs and makes the Quarterstaff an Implement.

Augment.Name: Melancholic Arcana (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +111 Equipment bonus to all Spellpowers. If this is slotted in a Quarterstaff, also grants a +2 Exceptional bonus to Spell DCs and makes the Quarterstaff an Implement.

Augment.Name: Dreadful Flames (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Adds Good alignment bypass. Your attacks and spells have a small chance to deal a large amount of Fire damage. (Undocumented: Grants Alchemical Fire Attunement)

Augment.Name: Dreadful Chill (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Adds Chaotic alignment bypass. Your attacks and spells have a chance to inflict ten stacks of Cold damage over time. (Undocumented: Grants Alchemical Water Attunement)

Augment.Name: Dreadful Sparks (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Adds Lawful alignment bypass. Your attacks and spells have a small chance to deal a massive amount of Electric damage. (Undocumented: Grants Alchemical Air Attunement)

Augment.Name: Dreadful Acid (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Adds Evil alignment bypass. Your attacks and spells deal a large amount of stacking Acid damage over time. (Undocumented: Grants Alchemical Earth Attunement)

Augment.Name: Dreadful Dimlight (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Your attacks and offensive spells have a chance to deal Untyped damage. (Undocumented: Grants Legendary Steam)

Augment.Name: Dreadful Shadows (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Your attacks and offensive spells have a chance to apply a Curse that deals significant Untyped damage over time. (Undocumented: Like Legendary Steam with 6d6+6 damage every 2 seconds for 12 sec, consecutive attacks extend duration to 1 min 25 sec)

Augment.Name: Dreadful Arcana (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +5 Equipment bonus to all Spell DCs. If this is slotted in a Quarterstaff, also grants a +5% Exceptional bonus to Spell Critical Chance and makes the Quarterstaff an Implement.

Augment.Name: Miserable Flames (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +2 Exceptional bonus to Strength.

Augment.Name: Miserable Chill (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +2 Exceptional bonus to Wisdom.

Augment.Name: Miserable Sparks (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +2 Exceptional bonus to Charisma.

Augment.Name: Miserable Acid (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +2 Exceptional bonus to Constitution.

Augment.Name: Miserable Dimlight (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +2 Exceptional bonus to Intelligence.

Augment.Name: Miserable Shadows (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +2 Exceptional bonus to Dexterity.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Acid (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +159 Equipment bonus to Acid Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Cold (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +159 Equipment bonus to Cold Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Electric (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +159 Equipment bonus to Electric Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Fire (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +159 Equipment bonus to Fire Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Force (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +159 Equipment bonus to Force and Physical Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Light (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +159 Equipment bonus to Light and Alignment Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Negative (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +159 Equipment bonus to Negative Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Positive (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +159 Equipment bonus to Positive Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Repair (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +159 Equipment bonus to Repair Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Sonic (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +159 Equipment bonus to Sonic Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Destruction (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Your attacks apply a stack of Armor Destruction. -1 penalty to Armor Class, -1% of its Fortification. 20 Second Duration. Stacks up to 15 times. This effect may trigger once every three seconds.

Augment.Name: Miserable Maiming (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Adds Maiming. When you score a critical hit with this weapon, it does an additional +7d8 damage.

Augment.Name: Miserable Humanoid Bane (Legendary)
Augment.Description: This weapon is attuned specifically to those that walk among us, dealing an additional 7d10 bane damage vs. Humanoids

Augment.Name: Miserable Monstrous Humanoid Bane (Legendary)
Augment.Description: This weapon is attuned specifically to hunt those who are descended from monsters dealing an additional 7d10 bane damage vs. Monstrous Humanoids.

Augment.Name: Miserable Undead Bane (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Those that have died must return, and this weapon is attuned specifically to lay them to rest. This weapon deals an additional 7d10 bane damage vs. Undead.

Augment.Name: Miserable Vermin Bane (Legendary)
Augment.Description: This weapon is ideal for cleaning out rats and other annoying beasts. It deals an additional 7d10 bane damage vs. Vermin.

Augment.Name: Miserable Armor-Piercing (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Adds Armor-Piercing. +23% Enhancement bonus to bypass enemy Fortification.

Augment.Name: Woeful Flames (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Your attacks and offensive spells have a chance to reduce enemy Magical Resistance Rating and Universal Spell Power. (Undocumented: Grants Legendary Ash)

Augment.Name: Woeful Chill (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Your attacks and offensive spells have a chance to freeze your target in a block of ice. (Undocumented: Grants Legendary Ice)

Augment.Name: Woeful Sparks (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Your attacks and offensive spells have a chance to inflict multiple stacks of Vulnerability. (Undocumented: Grants Legendary Vacuum)

Augment.Name: Woeful Acid (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Your attacks and offensive spells have a chance to reduce enemy Physical Resistance Rating and Positive Healing Amplification. (Undocumented: Grants Legendary Dust)

Augment.Name: Woeful Dimlight (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Your attacks and offensive spells have a chance to grant you 1,000 Temporary HP. (Undocumented: Grants Legendary Affirmation)

Augment.Name: Woeful Shadows (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Your attacks and offensive spells have a chance to reduce enemy Physical and Magical Resistance Rating. (Undocumented: Grants a version of Constricting Nightmare that works with spells)

Augment.Name: Melancholic False Life (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +57 Enhancement bonus to Maximum HP.

Augment.Name: Woeful Resistance (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +12 Resistance bonus to all Saving Throws.

Augment.Name: Woeful Enhanced Ghostly (Legendary)
Augment.Description: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee and missile attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 15% chance to miss you due to your incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.

Augment.Name: Woeful Relentless Fury (Legendary)
Augment.Description: While this item is equipped, any killing blows you strike against enemies may drive you into a furious rage, providing a 5% Enhancement damage bonus to your melee, ranged, and unarmed attacks for 30 seconds. Slaying weaker opponents has a reduced chance of producing this effect.

Augment.Name: Woeful Armor-Piercing (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +23% Enhancement bonus to Fortification bypass.

Augment.Name: Woeful Wizardry (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +310 Enhancement bonus to Maximum SP.

Augment.Name: Woeful Profane DCs (Legendary)
Augment.Description: You have a +2 Profane bonus to Spell DCs.

Augment.Name: Woeful Sacred DCs (Legendary)
Augment.Description: You have a +2 Sacred bonus to Spell DCs.

Augment.Name: Melancholic Device (Legendary)
Augment.Description: You have Deathblock and are Ghostly.

Augment.Name: Melancholic Plating (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +160% Enhancement bonus to Fortification.

Augment.Name: Melancholic Converter (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +61 Competence bonus to Positive Healing Amplification +61 Enhancement bonus to Repair Healing Amplification +61 Profane bonus to Negative Healing Amplification

Augment.Name: Melancholic Booster (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +5% Exceptional bonus to Universal Spell Lore.

Augment.Name: Dolorous Silencer (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +2d6 Profane bonus to your Sneak Attack Dice.

Augment.Name: Dolorous Invigorator (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +2 Profane bonus to Spell DCs, Tactical DCs, and Assassinate.

Augment.Name: Dolorous Voidwheel (Legendary)
Augment.Description: +15 Exceptional bonus to Universal Spell Power.
